body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Navigo Car Dealership. My name is Alan Morgan. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Victoria Brown.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Victoria. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am feeling frustrated because I have not received any updates on the shipping of my car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Victoria. Can you please provide me with your order number and contact number so I can look into this matter for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my order number is two three four five six and my contact number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Victoria. I will investigate this issue and get back to you as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Alan. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Victoria. Thank you for your patience. Have a great day!
